neocognitron

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • neocognitron.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Object which stores the location of a cell within a specific layer. It is a very similar to a three dimensional point.
    Author:
    Nicholas J. Conn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Instantiate a Location using k, the plane, and (x,y), the location in the plane

      Instantiate a Location using k, the plane, and n, the location in the plane

      • Location

        public Location(int k,
        int x,
        int y)
        Instantiate a Location using k, the plane, and (x,y), the location in the plane
        Parameters:
        k - The specific plane within the layer
        x - The specific location within the plane. Sometimes called n.
        y - The specific location within the plane. Sometimes called m.
